Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.user.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The class that describes a user.
    Author:
    Tiago DOS SANTOS, François KIM, Philippe PUONG, Axel SAINTILLAN
